message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.AI 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper deals with wireless networks and the transmission of packets, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The concept of measuring the credibility of information flows and minimizing loss-of-credibility involves information theory principles. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The problem of minimizing system-wide LoC requires control of temporal variance, which is a key aspect of systems and control. 
4. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper may touch upon security concerns related to the transmission of packets in wireless networks. 
5. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The end user's aim to make accurate real-time estimations using received packets may involve machine learning or other AI techniques.
